short_description: step ahead recruitment ltd. is a hr consulting & employment agency based in bracknell, united kingdom.
long_description: step ahead specialises in sales/marketing/digital recruitment. we provide a premium recruitment consultancy service, which combines the personal touch of a small independent company, with the delivery scope of a national network of specialist recruiters and consultants. our main focus is based on developing a business partnership with our clients, driven by our commitment to provide a personalised recruitment solution, which reflects the needs and culture of your business. we are a member of "team" the largest networked group of recruitment and employment service providers in the uk. as a result of our membership of the "team" network we are able to meet requirements for interim, contract or permanent recruitment outside our geographical area, and also source candidates with very specialised skillsets, outside of our specialist area.
